Farsali Volcanic Elixir (2018 formulation)

Brand: Farsali

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Calophyllum Inophyllum (Tamanu) Oil

Directions: Shake well before use. Apply to face and neck, before going to bed for best results.
